email: {field} must be a valid email address.
passwordAscii: {field} must contain only ASCII-standard characters (no accents or accented characters).
passwordUpper: {field} should include at least one uppercase letter.
passwordLower: {field} should include at least one lowercase letter.
passwordNumber: {field} should include at least one number.
passwordSpecial: {field} should include at least one special character.
